title: Auto-generate baseline benchmarks from historical CRM data during setup

sections.text: Add a setup step that analyzes the last 6–12 months of CRM opportunity history to propose default benchmarks (e.g., average stage duration, stage-to-stage conversion rates, win rate, and typical deal size by segment if available). Surface these as editable defaults with clear data coverage indicators (sample size/time window) so admins can accept or tune them. Persist the chosen benchmarks for use in forecasting calibration and “deal at risk” alerts without requiring manual spreadsheet-driven configuration.
